title: 3 and Out - Talkative Tom; Legit Tua Concerns; Another Bad Bill O'Brien Trade; Draft Hack Paranoia; Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Talkative Tom; Legit Tua Concerns; Another Bad Bill O'Brien Trade; Draft Hack Paranoia; Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff discusses Tom Brady's extended interview with Howard Stern, if he'll continue to be more talkative during the season, the debate heating up around Tua's medicals heading into the draft, and why John has some serious questions about his NFL potential aside from the injury questions. He also looks at Bill O'Brien's latest head scratching trade, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
